title: Mark Cameron - Playing Rough 2016 320ak        (Blues Rock)
description:
Mark Cameron-Playing Rough 2016 320ak
 
Playing Rough features a range of Blues from front porch slide to funky up tempo blues. A tour de force for harp lovers and additional flute tracks add a twist to the fourth album by vocalist/songwriter Mark Cameron.   

Bass player Dave Keyes toured for more than 15 years all over Europe with Willy DeVille and his band Mink DeVille, and is currently touring with progressive rock band Renaissance with Annie Haslam. Dave is the best bass player I have ever heard perform live, and as you can hear on these tracks, he's pretty dang good layin' down the blues on his six string, too. 

ALBUM: Playing Rough
    
YEAR: 2016
    
COUNTRY: USA
    
STYLE: Blues, Modern Electric Blues
    
DURATION:  0:49:19
    
FILE FORMAT: MP3
    
QUALITY: 320 kbps

  
Size: 113 MB (Files: 13)
